00034  // Some of this code may have elements taken from other code without attribution.

00038 
00039 #include "usart.h"
00040 
00041 // JWP 6/16/11 added to change transmission logic.
00042 // this function waits until a pending transmission is complete
00043 // then sends a byte. If the usart_buffered_TX_flag is set true
00044 // then the ISR continues to send until the buffer is empty, otherwise
00045 // the ISR just sends the byte. 
00046 void usart0_send_buffer(void)
00047 {
00048         // Set flag for ISR
00049         usart_buffered_tx_flag = true;
00050         // Send the first byte
00051         usart0_send();
00052 }
00053
